sbo 0.3.2.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

sbo (development version) Unreleased

API changes

  • metadata of kgram_freqs and sbo_preds objects are now attributes (#11).

New features

  • Added summary() methods for kgram_freqs and sbo_preds objects; correspondingly, the output of print() has been simplified considerably (#5).

sbo 0.3.2 2020-11-09

  • Patch addressing inexpected behaviour of erase argument in preprocess() and get_kgram_freqs_fast(), c.f. issue #17.

sbo 0.3.1 Unreleased

  • Changed leading to trailing underscore in private variables definition of C++ kgramFreqs class, as per §1.6.4 of the “Writing R extensions” guide.
  • Removed Catch tests infrastructure for C++ code.

sbo 0.3.0 2020-11-04

  • Added get_kgram_freqs_fast() for fast and memory efficient kgram tokenization using the default text preprocessing utility.

sbo 0.2.0 Unreleased

  • The infrastructure of get_kgram_freqs(), get_word_freqs(), preprocess(), and predict.sbo_preds() has been entirely rewritten in C++.
  • Added tokenize_sentences() function for sentence level tokenization.
  • get_kgram_freqs() now accepts any user defined single character EOS token, through the EOS argument.

sbo 0.1.2 Unreleased

  • Added preproc argument to get_kgram_freqs() and get_word_freqs(), for custom training corpus preprocessing.
  • The dict argument of get_kgram_freqs() now also accepts numeric values, allowing to build a dictionary directly from the training corpus.

sbo 0.1.1 Unreleased

  • Added predict method for kgram_freqs class.

Contents

Developed by Valerio Gherardi.
